description: Generates an app shell for running a server-side version of an app.
title: Angular AppShell Options Schema

___testTsconfigFileName.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file for tests.

___main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

___appDir.description: The name of the application directory.

___index.description: The name of the index file

___tsconfigFileName.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

___outDir.description: The output directory for build results.

___test.description: The name of the test entry-point file.

___name.description: The HTML selector of the Universal app

___rootModuleFileName.description: The name of the root module file

___clientProject.description: The name of the related client app.

___appId.description: The app ID to use in withServerTransition().

___universalProject.description: The name of related Universal app.

___route.description: Route path used to produce the app shell.

___sourceDir.description: The path of the source directory.

___rootModuleClassName.description: The name of the root module class.

___root.description: The root directory of the app.
